problem_names: lemma insort_bot[simp]: "insort bot xs = bot # xs" for xs :: "'a::{order_bot,linorder} list"
lemmas insort_0_ordinal[simp] = insort_bot[of "xs :: ordinal list" for xs, unfolded bot_ordinal_def]

lemma from_cnf_less_\<omega>_exp:
  assumes "\<forall>k \<in> set ks. k < l"
  shows "from_cnf ks < \<omega> ** l"
lemma from_cnf_append[simp]: "from_cnf (ks @ ls) = from_cnf ks + from_cnf ls"
lemma subseq_from_cnf_less_eq: "Sublist.subseq ks ls \<Longrightarrow> from_cnf ks \<le> from_cnf ls"
lemma less_imp_ordinal_of_hmset_less: "k < l \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l"
lemma ordinal_of_hmset_less[simp]: "ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l \<longleftrightarrow> k < l"
translations: lemma insort_bot[simp]: "insort bot xs = bot # xs" for xs :: "'a::{order_bot,linorder} list"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. insort bot xs = bot # xs
lemmas insort_0_ordinal[simp] = insort_bot[of "xs :: ordinal list" for xs, unfolded bot_ordinal_def]

proof (prove)

by (induct rule: list_emb.induct) (auto intro: ordinal_le_plusL order_trans)
subsection \<open>Embedding of Syntactic Ordinals into Huffman's Ordinals\<close>

primrec ordinal_of_hmset :: "hmultiset \<Rightarrow> ordinal" where
  "ordinal_of_hmset (HMSet M) =
   from_cnf (rev (sorted_list_of_multiset (image_mset ordinal_of_hmset M)))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ordinal_of_hmset (k + 1) = ordinal_of_hmset k + 1

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ordinal_of_hmset
     (HMSet (hmsetmset k + hmsetmset (\<omega>\<^sub>h^ 0))) =
    ordinal_of_hmset k + 1

proof (prove)
using this:
  ordinal_of_hmset (0 + 1) = ordinal_of_hmset 0 + 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ordinal_of_hmset 1 = 1

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ordinal_of_hmset (\<omega>\<^sub>h^ k) = \<omega> ** ordinal_of_hmset k
lemma less_imp_ordinal_of_hmset_less: "k < l \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. k < l \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l

proof (simp only: atomize_imp,
    rule measure_induct_rule[of "\<lambda>(k, l). {#k, l#}"
        "\<lambda>(k, l). k < l \<longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l" "(k, l)",
      simplified prod.case],
    simp only: split_paired_all prod.case atomize_imp[symmetric])

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>aa ba.
                   \<lbrakk>{#aa, ba#} < {#a, b#}; aa < ba\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset aa
                                     < ordinal_of_hmset ba;
        a < b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset a < ordinal_of_hmset b

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>aa ba.
                   \<lbrakk>{#aa, ba#} < {#a, b#}; aa < ba\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset aa
                                     < ordinal_of_hmset ba;
        a < b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset a < ordinal_of_hmset b

assume
    ih: "\<And>ka la. {#ka, la#} < {#k, l#} \<Longrightarrow> ka < la \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset ka < ordinal_of_hmset la" and
    k_lt_l: "k < l"

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>{#?ka, ?la#} < {#k, l#}; ?ka < ?la\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset ?ka < ordinal_of_hmset ?la
  k < l

goal (1 subgoal):

                   \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset aa
                                     < ordinal_of_hmset ba;
        a < b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset a < ordinal_of_hmset b

lemma ordinal_of_hmset_less[simp]: "ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l \<longleftrightarrow> k < l"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l) = (k < l)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x < ?y \<Longrightarrow> (\<not> ?y < ?x) = True
  ?k < ?l \<Longrightarrow> ordinal_of_hmset ?k < ordinal_of_hmset ?l
  (?x \<noteq> ?y) = (?x < ?y \<or> ?y < ?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (ordinal_of_hmset k < ordinal_of_hmset l) = (k < l)
